com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.lang

Class LangStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.lang.LangStorage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExternalLangStorage

    public class LangStorage
extends java.lang.Object
    A lang storage holds all lang keys (and their translations) that are translated into one locale

    • Field Summary

      protected java.io.File langFile 
      protected java.io.File langFolder 
      protected OrderedProperties messages

    • Method Detail

      • setTranslatable

        public void setTranslatable(@Nonnull
                            Translatable translatable)

      • getLocale

        @Nonnull
public Locale getLocale()
        Returns:
        the local that the keys in this storage are translated with

      • setLocale

        public void setLocale(@Nonnull
                      Locale locale)
        sets the locale (and with that, the lang file) for this storage
        Parameters:
        locale - the new locale to set

      • setParentStorage

        public void setParentStorage(@Nonnull
                             LangStorage parentStorage)
        sets the parent storage for this storage. the parent storage is used to get keys that are not translated in this storage.
        Parameters:
        parentStorage - the new parent storage

      • saveDefaultValue

        public void saveDefaultValue()
        Saves the default values for the local that this storage is using to the lang file.

      • processNewValues

        public int processNewValues()
        Adds new values to the lang file, if there where any new added with a update.
        Returns:
        the amount of new values that have been added.

      • load

        public void load()
        Tries to load the messages from the langFolder
        Throws:
        LangException - if something goes wrong while loading

      • get

        @Nonnull
public java.lang.String get(@Nonnull
                                     Translatable key)
        Gets the value for a key. it this storage does not have a translation for that key, the parent storage is used. If parent has no translation for that key, the default value is used.
        Parameters:
        key - the key that should be translated
        Returns:
        the translation for that key

      • getLangFile

        @Nonnull
public java.io.File getLangFile()
        Returns:
        the file that this storage saves its keys in
